Class Walk

java.lang.Object
Walk
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cycle, Path
public class Walk
extends java.lang.Object
A walk is a sequence of vertices v1 v2 v3 ... vn where, for all i < n, vi is adjacent to v(i+1) in the graph. The length of a walk is the corresponding number of edges, n - 1 (where n is the length of the vertex sequence). Each walk has a front vertex (v1) and a back vertex (vn). A walk of length zero has front = back = v1.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Walk​(Vertex v)
    Constructs a walk of length 0 from a given vertex.
